methods.name: transferOwnership
methods.desc: Transfers the ownership of the contract to a new owner.Requires the caller to be the current owner.

args.name: newOwner
args.desc: The address of the new owner.

methods.name: deploy
methods.desc: Deploy a Partner, setting the owner as provided

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Allows the owner to update the smart contract

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc: Destroy the smart contract, sending all Algo to the owner account. This can only be done if there are no active cards

methods.name: setWithdrawalRounds
methods.desc: Set the number of rounds a withdrawal request must wait until being withdrawn

args.name: rounds
args.desc: New number of rounds to wait

methods.name: cardCreate
methods.desc: Create account. This generates a brand new account and funds the minimum balance requirement

args.name: cardHolder
args.desc: Address to have control over asset withdrawals

returns.desc: Newly generated account used by their card

methods.name: cardClose
methods.desc: Close account. This permanently removes the rekey and deletes the account from the ledger

args.name: cardHolder
args.desc: Address which has control over asset withdrawals

methods.name: cardDebit
methods.desc: Debits the specified amount of the given asset from the card account.Only the owner of the contract can perform this operation.

args.name: card
args.desc: The card account from which the asset will be debited.

args.name: amount
args.desc: The amount of the asset to be debited.

methods.name: cardRefund
methods.desc: Refunds a specified amount of an asset to a card account.Only the owner of the contract can perform this operation.

args.name: card
args.desc: The card account to refund the asset to.

args.name: amount
args.desc: The amount of the asset to refund.

methods.name: settle
methods.desc: Settles a payment by transferring an asset to the specified recipient.Only the owner of the contract can call this function.

args.name: amount
args.desc: The amount of the asset to be transferred.

methods.name: cardWithdrawalRequest
methods.desc: Allows the Card Holder to send an amount of assets from the account

returns.desc: Withdrawal hash used for completing or cancelling the withdrawal

methods.name: cardWithdrawalCancel
methods.desc: Allows the Card Holder (or contract owner) to cancel a withdrawal request

methods.name: cardWithdraw
methods.desc: Allows the Card Holder to send an amount of assets from the account

args.name: recipient
args.desc: Receiver of the assets being withdrawn

events.name: OwnershipTransferred
events.desc: Event emitted when ownership of the contract is transferred.
